lines.text: Don't think I'm gonna expect nothing of you just because you're crazy!

[despairingly]
They won't let me sleep with the Sandman!
I'm not a caterpillar, I'm a moustache.
I'm gonna get through this for what? To be what? Just less, and then less, and then less and less... I don't wanna end up on a back ward somewhere. I'd rather be nothing, you know...
Well, it feels like being in a dream... and it feels like a really important dream. But it's not a dream, because you're not asleep. And because you're not asleep you can't wake up.
